title: The Shadow of the Wind
books_description: As Celia and Marco showcase their extraordinary talents, the circus becomes a stage for their magical displays, captivating audiences with its fantastical attractions. However, as the competition intensifies, the stakes grow higher, and the consequences of their actions become increasingly perilous.
